name: Christmas TD 2
description:
Made this mainly for my little brothers as little challenge with some rewards, like the version of last year... (whichs is now public too)

Kinda a fail.
Map got kinda huge and the content isnt really finished, so you have:
1 Level to play

What i created on what day + Conclusion
https://docs.google.com/document/d/12t3BMhjg6aCq-iBo7emK7wwtgbQTqK4H2pS-mxW1fPg/...

In short:
I thought i have way more time, planned for like 80 hours of work and created plans for it, in the end i had ca 35 hours.
So in the end the content is weirdly balanced in quantity, quality and gameplay.
still better than the 2019 version: https://ererbe.itch.io/christmas-td

there will be the probably final version in 2021 containing what I planned for this year:
- full story why this is happening
- antagonist
- more and more different tower types
- more enemies
- better explaination
- better maps
- camera controller
- more than 1 level
